summary: Initializes the DGL sparse submodule by importing and exposing sparse matrix classes and a suite of operations—including creation, elementwise arithmetic, matrix multiplication, reductions, SDDMM, softmax, and unary/diagonal transformations—enabling efficient handling of sparse tensors in graph neural network workflows.
business_intent: Equip developers with a comprehensive, high‑performance API for sparse tensor manipulation within DGL, facilitating scalable graph processing and GNN model implementation.
